item.title: Added New Relic an observability platform
item.description: https://www.newrelic.com - Observability platform built to help engineers create more perfect software. From monoliths to serverless, you can instrument everything, then analyze, troubleshoot, and optimize your entire software stack. Free tier offers 100GB/month of free data ingest, 1 free full access user, and unlimited free basic users.

item.title: Added appfleet
item.description: https://appfleet.com/ - appfleet is an edge platform that allows its users to deploy containers globally to multiple regions at the same time. It offers a simple to use UI while automating all the complexity like smart routing, clustering, failover, monitoring and so on. Itâ€™s free for open source projects and all users automatically get $10 to host whatever they want.
